name: Raffaella Bernardi
content: Raffaella Bernardi | web site Web pages of R. Bernardi at UniTN (moved to Unibz) Home page my details Raffaella Bernardi, Associate Professor (2025-present), Faculty of Engineering, Free University of Bozen-Bolzano Associate Professor (2020-2025), at DISI and CIMeC, University of Trento (UniTN). PI of the LaVi group, and member of the CLIC Lab at CIMeC.
